author: Nicole Wetsman
title: Health departments are concerned about spikes in STIs while attention is on COVID-19
description: Experts are concerned rates of HIV, syphilis, gonorrhea, and other STIs could spike, and STI programs are reducing clinic hours and services because of the risks of COVID-19. Many people who usually work on HIV and STD response have been pulled into the coron…
content:
Some places are already seeing case clusters
Photo by Fabian Sommer/picture alliance via Getty Images
Across Idaho, the number of people getting tested for sexually transmitted infections and HIV has cratered. The Department of Health and Welfare is screeni… [+6246 chars]
